definitions.text: excite the curiosity of; engage the interest of

examples: I worry about the second Germanic consonant shift

definitions.text: having or showing interest; especially curiosity or fascination or concern
examples: was interested to hear about her family
interested in knowing who was on the telephone

definitions.text: involved in or affected by or having a claim to or share in
examples: an enterprise in which three men are concerned
factors concerned in the rise and fall of epidemics
the interested parties met to discuss the business
